title: All our horses are 100% horse-fed for that double-horse 'juiced-in' goodness.
body: <p>Not really, but from the sounds of <a href="http://www.organicconsumers.org/foodsafety/horse021006.cfm" title="USDA Circumvents Congressional Ban on Horse Slaughter for Food">this article</a>, <a href="http://www.gotfuturama.com/Multimedia/EpisodeSounds/3ACV04/#4">Futurama</a> wasn't that far off. I love the Pepsi/Coke bit from that episode:</p><blockquote>Man: And you, Sir? How can I horse you?</blockquote><blockquote>Hermes: I'll have a horse Coke.</blockquote><blockquote>Man: Horse Pepsi okay?</blockquote><blockquote>Hermes: Nay.</blockquote>
bodyArticleHtml:
2006-03-03

All our horses are 100% horse-fed for that double-horse 'juiced-in' goodness.
